title: GET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_PEDS
content:
0xEBA5AD3A0EAF71210xE254C39C// GetRelationshipBetweenPeds
int GET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_PEDS(Ped ped1, Ped ped2);Gets the relationship between two peds. This should be called twice (once for each ped).  
Relationship types:  
0 = Companion  
1 = Respect  
2 = Like  
3 = Neutral  
4 = Dislike  
5 = Hate  
255 = Pedestrians  
(Credits: Inco)  
Example:  
PED::GET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_PEDS(2, l_1017, 0xA49E591C);  
PED::GET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_PEDS(2, 0xA49E591C, l_1017);
codeBlocks:
// GetRelationshipBetweenPeds
int GET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_PEDS(Ped ped1, Ped ped2);

Gets the relationship between two peds. This should be called twice (once for each ped).  
Relationship types:  
0 = Companion  
1 = Respect  
2 = Like  
3 = Neutral  
4 = Dislike  
5 = Hate  
255 = Pedestrians  
(Credits: Inco)  
Example:  
PED::GET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_PEDS(2, l_1017, 0xA49E591C);  
PED::GET_RELATIONSHIP_BETWEEN_PEDS(2, 0xA49E591C, l_1017);
